New Records: Suryakumar Yadav scored an unbeaten 26 off 31 balls
New Zealand scored their lowest total against India in a full-length T20I
Spinners bowled 30 overs in the match, the most in a game involving Full Member teams
Key Match Events: Finn Allen and Devon Conway were dismissed by spinners early in the innings
Kuldeep Yadav took crucial wickets including Daryl Mitchell and Mark Chapman
Suryakumar Yadav hit a crucial six off Blair Tickner to help India win
Pre-Game Insights: Mitchell Santner opted to bat after winning the toss
India brought in Yuzvendra Chahal for spin support
New Zealand used five spinners in the match
Post-Match Reflections: New Zealand lost three in a row to reverse-sweep
Suryakumar Yadav and Washington Sundar calmed India's innings
Hardik Pandya and Arshdeep Singh contributed in the death overs
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a low-scoring thriller
There were no sixes in either innings
